snippet.title: Join the No-brainer Heros. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1097420/Nobrainer_Heroes/
snippet.description:
No-brainer Heroes is a pixel-style semi-idle RPG game. As a lord, you need to run your town, recruit your heroes, defeat level monsters, solve random events, collect powerful treasures, and finally defeat evil dragons. 
MY MERCH!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1097420/Nobrainer_Heroes/
MY DISCORD!: https://discord.gg/p29m2zN / https://discord.gg/Bm3RHBZ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/lvy89452846
